Fahri Hamzah Minta KPK Waspadai Konflik Kepentingan di Kasus Novel Baswedan
06 Nov 2019, 20:01 by Bunaiya Fauzi Arubone


Fahri Hamzah Minta KPK Waspadai Konflik Kepentingan di Kasus Novel Baswedan

KBRN, Jakarta : Mantan Wakil Ketua DPR RI periode 2014-2019, Fahri Hamzah mengingatkan Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK) untuk tidak terjebak dalam konflik kepentingan. Sekalipun itu terkait dengan kasus dugaan penyiraman air keras yang dialami oleh penyidik senior, Novel Baswedan.Menurut Fahri, kasus tersebut tidak saja tragedi bagi Novel dan keluarganya, tapi juga bagi dunia hukum. Namun demikian, ditekankanya bahwa menyeret KPK untuk terus menjadikan kasus ini sebagai bagian dari kerja kelembagaan antirasuah merupakan kesalahan fatal."Beliau dan keluarga terpukul dan kita semua pasti simpati. Dengan hormat, saya usul kepada KPK agar cukup memberikan bantuan hukum dan membiarkan Novel bekerja untuk hak-hak pribadinya," kata Fahri lewat akun twitter pribadinya @FahriHamzah, Rabu (6/11/2019).Cuitan Fahri ini menanggapi maraknya di media sosial (medsos) yang belakangan ramai dengan pembicaraan kasus penyiraman air keras terhadap Novel Baswedan direkayasa. Hal itu sebagaimana postingan akun Twitter @AdellaWibawa dan @Triwulan. Lebih lanjut Fahri Hamzah mengatakan, pelibatan lembaga KPK merugikan kedua belah pihak, khususnya KPK sebagai lembaga publik. Apalagi, sejak lama KPK telah menjadikan Kantor KPK sebagai markas untuk mengumpulkan orang dan melakukan pembelaan kepada pejabat KPK yang terkena kasus."Cara ini salah, lembaga tidak boleh dikorbankan untuk menggalang dukungan pribadi apalagi berhadapan dengan lembaga lain. Ini adalah konflik kepentingan yang harus dihindari oleh KPK," tegas  salah satu pentolan Partai Gelombang Rakyat (Gelora) yang bakal dideklarasikan dalam aktu dekat itu.Fahri mencontohkan ada banyak tentara yang gugur dalam tugas dan ada banyak jaksa, dan pejabat dari atas dan bawah gugur tanpa tanda jasa. Tapi, mereka yang mendapat musibah dalam tugas tetaplah memberikan kepercayaan kepada penegak hukum untuk memproses tanpa menggunakan TNI, Kejaksaan dan lain-lain untuk menekan.Karena itu, dirinya menyarankan agar pemberantasan korupsi dan penegakan hukum secara umum harus mengandung unsur saling percaya, dan saling mendukung antara sesama penegak hukum. Bahkan lebih dari pada itu, pada prilaku lembaga-lembaga ini harus dihindari konflik kepentingan (conflict of interest) sebagai prinsip dasar."Ayo lembaga negara saling dukung, bersatulah menghadapi persoalan bersama. Tidak ada yang sulit apabila lembaga negara bersatu. Tapi jika lembaga negara saling menjatuhkan maka pupuslah harapan rakyat untuk melihat Indonesia bersih. Selamat bersatu! Ayo KPK kembali bersatu!" ajak inisiator Gerakan Arah Baru Indonesia (GARBI) itu. Sebelumnya, akun Twitter @AdellaWibawa dan @Triwulan memposting tentang adanya dugaan rekayasa kasus penyiraman air keras terhadap Novel Baswedan. Pasalnya, hanya mata Novel yang terdampak air keras. Sementara bagian wajahnya yang lain, seperti pipi sama sekali tidak terdampak.Sementara itu, lewat akun twitter resminya @KPK_RI, KPK Mmenjelaskan tentang kondisi Novel Baswedan terkini pasca penyiraman air keras. Hal itu bertujuan agar masyarakat mendapat informasi yang benar."KPK menyimak beredarnya informasi-informasi keliru dan bahkan cenderung sebagai penyebaran informasi bohong tentang kondisi mata pegawai KPK Novel," demikian tulis akun twitter @KPK_RI. (Foto: Tangkap Layar/TV One)

Fahri Hamzah Asks KPK to Beware of Conflicts of Interest in the Baswedan Novel Case
Nov 6, 2019, 20:01 by Bunaiya Fauzi Arubone


Fahri Hamzah Asks KPK to Beware of Conflicts of Interest in the Baswedan Novel Case

KBRN, Jakarta: Former Deputy Speaker of the Indonesian Parliament for the 2014-2019 period, Fahri Hamzah reminded the Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK) not to be caught in a conflict of interest. Even though it is related to the case of alleged hard watering experienced by senior investigators, Novel Baswedan. According to Fahri, the case is not only a tragedy for Novel and his family, but also for the legal world. However, he stressed that dragging the KPK to continue making this case as part of institutional work is a fatal mistake. "He and his family were devastated and we all must be sympathetic. With respect, I propose to the KPK to provide enough legal assistance and let the Novel work for his personal rights, "Fahri said through his personal Twitter account @ Fahri Hamzah, Wednesday (11/06/2019). Fahri's chat was responding to the rise in social media (social media), which was later crowded with talk of a hard watering case against the engineered Baswedan Novel. That is like the Twitter account posts @ AdellaWibawa and @Triwulan. Fahri Hamzah further said, the involvement of the KPK institution was detrimental to both parties, especially the KPK as a public institution. Moreover, the KPK has long made the KPK Office a base for gathering people and defending KPK officials affected by the case. "This method is wrong, institutions should not be sacrificed to garner personal support let alone confront other institutions. This is a conflict of interest that must be avoided by the KPK, "stressed one of the leaders of the People's Wave Party (Gelora) which would be declared in the close act. Fahri exemplified that there were many soldiers who were killed in the task and there were many prosecutors, and officials from above and below died without any honors. But, those who get the disaster in the task of continuing to give confidence to law enforcement to process without using the TNI, Attorney and others to suppress. Therefore, he suggested that the eradication of corruption and law enforcement in general must contain elements of mutual trust, and mutual support among fellow law enforcement. Even more than that, the behavior of these institutions must be avoided conflict of interest as a basic principle. "Let's state institutions support each other, unite in facing common problems. Nothing is difficult if state institutions unite. But if state institutions bringing each other down then the hope of the people to see Indonesia clean. Congratulations unite! Come KPK back together! " invited the initiator of the New Indonesian Direction Movement (GARBI). Previously, Twitter accounts @ AdellaWibawa and @Triwulan posted about the alleged engineering of a hard watering case against the Baswedan Novel. The reason is, only Novel's eyes were affected by hard water. While the other parts of his face, like cheeks, were completely unaffected. Meanwhile, through his official Twitter account @KPK_RI, the KPK explained the current condition of the Baswedan Novel after watering hard. It aims to get the public to get the right information. "The KPK listens to the circulation of misinformation and even tends to spread hoax information about the eye condition of the Novel KPK employees," wrote the @KPK_RI Twitter account.
